abstract: Information about the arguments of a compute function.
overview:
## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object provides access to the arguments of the compute function used in an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object. An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object can be created along with an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object. Don’t create an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object directly. Instead, call either the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeComputePipelineState(function:options:reflection:)] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeComputePipelineState(function:options:completionHandler:)] method of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] to create both an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object and an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object.

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] objects can use a significant amount of memory; release any strong references to them after you finish creating pipeline objects.

# MTLComputePipelineReflection

**Class**

Information about the arguments of a compute function.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLComputePipelineReflection
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object provides access to the arguments of the compute function used in an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object. An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object can be created along with an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object. Don’t create an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object directly. Instead, call either the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeComputePipelineState(function:options:reflection:)] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeComputePipelineState(function:options:completionHandler:)] method of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] to create both an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineState] object and an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] object.

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputePipelineReflection] objects can use a significant amount of memory; release any strong references to them after you finish creating pipeline objects.

## Obtaining the arguments of the compute function

- **arguments**: An array of instances that describe the arguments of a compute function.

## Instance Properties

- **bindings**

## Introspection data

- **MTLAutoreleasedComputePipelineReflection**: A convenience type alias for an autoreleased compute pipeline reflection object.
- **MTLRenderPipelineReflection**: Information about the arguments of a graphics function.
- **MTLAutoreleasedRenderPipelineReflection**: A convenience type alias for an autoreleased pipeline reflection instance.
- **MTLBindingType**
- **MTLBinding**
- **MTLBindingAccess**
- **MTLBufferBinding**
- **MTLTextureBinding**
- **MTLThreadgroupBinding**
- **MTLObjectPayloadBinding**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
